name: Dimension Destination
description:
Dimension Destination is a short, educational game designed to provide an opportunity for high-school students to apply their "coordinate geometry" skills.  It merges mathematics learning with Sustainable Development Goals through its narrative.

Depending on the internet speed of the user, the game might take a minute or two to load. Please be patient.

Recommended Resolution: 1920 X 1080.

Play in Full Screen. In most monitors, the 'Oxygen Level' bar is only visible in full screen.

Created by: Robin Sharma

I am an educational researcher exploring the potential of digital games for learning. To know more about my work and contact me please visit my website 'chaturbhujedu.com'.
